So, my characters go back to base, because of overkill and too many shots
and rule breaking they were bleeding and battered and bruised, and heading
back to their base...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Alloran2@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, October 15, 2000 7:27 PM
Subject: Re: It's Battle Time!


> :::Jetstorm/Sharpedge:::
>
> ::Sharpedge gets hit by the Autoguns, but Jetstorm dodges.  Sharpedge
dodges
> the missles and shoots 2 missles at Dark One.  Jetstorm sees Nemises
> Enforcers streategy on using his wings as shields.  He blocks the shots
with
> his wing, which was still kicking.  he fired 25 energy blasts and 25 rapid
> fire optic blasts at Nemises Enforcer, hoping to destroy his wings so hed
be
> more vulnerable.  They hear the retreat call::
> Jetstorm: Say what?
> Sharpedge: Damn! I almost had that Scattershot guy!
> ::Jetstorm transforms in jet mode and flies out, while Sharpedge limps
back
> to the Chosen Mafia base::
>
>
>
>
